mapper.sql: flightid, flight_number, departure_time, arrival_time, departure_airport, arrival_airport, seat_number, seat_free, price

flightid,

mapper.update:
update flight
flight_number = #{flightNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
departure_time = #{departureTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
arrival_time = #{arrivalTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
departure_airport = #{departureAirport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
arrival_airport = #{arrivalAirport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seat_number = #{seatNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
seat_free = #{seatFree,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where flightid = #{flightid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update flight set flight_number = #{flightNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, departure_time = #{departureTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, arrival_time = #{arrivalTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, departure_airport = #{departureAirport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, arrival_airport = #{arrivalAirport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seat_number = #{seatNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, seat_free = #{seatFree,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER} where flightid = #{flightid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
